title: Bug 137464: Failure to refresh data preview when applying a filter on a Join dataset in chart editor's select data page
description: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview part is not refreshed.
OB: The data preview part in the chart editor's select data page does not update when a filter is applied to a Join dataset.
EB: The data preview part in the chart editor's select data page should update immediately when a filter is applied to a Join dataset.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached file.
2. Create a chart and navigate to the select data page.
3. Use a Join dataset and set the X and Y series.
4. Apply a filter and observe that the data preview part does not refresh.
